ComicInfo.Summary: Sabina hunts down the last two Monster-cyborgs from Russia, with the hope that Yuri will give her the key to her humanity. Sabina, a Russian -built cold war weapon was programmed to destroy the evidence of more ex-cold war weapons hiding in America! When her job is done....so is she as far as her builders are concerned! But Yuri is starting to realize that there's more to Sabina than nuts and bolts....there's a real life person under all that weaponry. Things get sticky in this issue, so be sure not to miss it!
